#include <iostream>
#include <stdio.h>
#include <utility>
#include <algorithm>
#include <cstring>
#include <vector>
#include <map>
#include <set>
#include <queue>
#include <math.h>
 
#define FOR(i,x,y) for(int i=(x);i<(y);i++)
#define MIN(x,y) ((x)<(y)?(x):(y))
#define MAX(x,y) ((x)>(y)?(x):(y))
#define ABS(x) ((x)>0?(x):-(x))
#define SQ(x) ((x)*(x))
 
using namespace std;
 
vector<int> adl[100010];
int size[100010];
int done[100010];
int main()
{
    int n,m,k,a,b,temp,count;
    scanf("%d%d%d",&n,&m,&k);
    count=n;
    queue<int> que;
    FOR(i,0,m)
    {
              scanf("%d%d",&a,&b);
              adl[a].push_back(b),adl[b].push_back(a);
              size[a]++,size[b]++;
              }
    FOR(i,0,n) if(size[i]<k) que.push(i),done[i]=1,count--;
    while(que.size())
    {
                     temp=que.front();
                     que.pop();
                     FOR(i,0,adl[temp].size()) size[adl[temp][i]]--;
                     FOR(i,0,adl[temp].size()) if(!done[adl[temp][i]])if(size[adl[temp][i]]<k) done[adl[temp][i]]=1,que.push(adl[temp][i]),count--;
                     }
    printf("%d\n",count);
    return 0;
}
